name: kendo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sport, originally from Japan, in which people fight using bamboo sticks: He has a master certification in kendo, the martial art of Japanese fencing. You can watch a display of kendo swordsmanship.
OSTILL/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe athletes competed in martial arts such as kendo as well as soccer, swimming and the marathon. Kendo originated from an early battlefield art called kenjutsu, which is the ancient samurai art of the sword.Edajima is a kendo master.
